pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Environment for Tree Exploration (ETE) is a Python programmingtoolkit that assists in the automated manipulation, analysis andvisualization of phylogenetic trees (although clustering trees or anyother tree-like data structure could be used). ETE is currently developed as a tool for researchers working inphylogenetics and genomics. If you use ETE for a published work,please cite::: Jaime Huerta-Cepas, Joaquin Dopazo and Toni Gabaldon. ETE: a python Environment for Tree Exploration. BMC Bioinformatics 2010, 11:24.Visit http://etetoolkit.org for more info.
